channel.title: The Cranes on Abigail Elizabeth
channel.description: Recent content in The Cranes on Abigail Elizabeth

item.title: Part One: Trucks, Bare Feet, and that Awful Sound
item.description: We never saw trucks by the water. There was no need for them, as anything worth reaching could be found by foot, or at the very least, a small car. Never a truck. The last time we saw a truck was years ago. All the children stood from their studies and ran after it, barefoot, until we couldn’t breathe. A week later, we learned Katie’s dad had packed his belongings and left.
